result.execSummary:
The defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Alonzo Antonio Funches was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alonzo Antonio Funches is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Alonzo Antonio Funches was found guilty of 1st Deg. Sexual Assault-Use/Dang.Weapon, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(1)(b).
  • Alonzo Antonio Funches was found guilty of 1st Deg. Sexual Assault-Use/Dang.Weapon, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
TBD at hearing on June 22, 2017.
*06-22-17/Rest. Hearing - Court sets restitution in the amount of $1,511.33, payable to State of Wisconsin/Dept. of Justice/Wisconsin SAFE Fund. Cash bail applied.

EACH COUNT: Provide DNA sample- pay surcharge.
*Pay all applicable mandatory surcharges, fees, assessments, and costs.
*The defendant shall pay restitution FIRST; amount to be determined.  The Court orders all court ordered financial obligation be paid from prison funds in an amount or percentage the Department (DOC) determines to be reasonable and as a condition of extended supervision.  DOC shall collect those sums.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment.

Consecutive to: CONSECUTIVE to COUNT 3, CONCURRENT with Washington County case 17CF023 with credit for 250 days.
**10/28/2019  Honorable Stephanie G. Rothstein:  Sentence credit amended to 252 days.

superMiscConds.notes: *No contact with the victims (OSB and CB).
*Obtain Sex Offender evaluation and comply with any recommended treatment.
*Obtain AODA assessment and comply with any recommended follow-up care/treatment.

supervisions.notes:
*Defendant is informed that he may not possess any firearms.
*Defendant is informed that he may not vote in any election until his civil rights have been reinstated.

Per Rest. Hearing 06-22-2017 - Court set restittuion at $1,511.33 pauable to State of Wisconsin/Dept. of Justice/Wisconsin SAFE Fund.

Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in court with Attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in custody.  Grant Ian Huebner, for Kristin Schrank, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Statements to the Court.
Court sets Restitution in the amount of $1,511.33
-  Restitution to be paid to the State of Wisconsin  / Dept. of Justice / Wisconsin SAFE Fund
-  Restitution to be paid during extended supervision.  Any cash bail posted on this case to be applied to Restitution ordered.
-  Any remaining bail posted on this case to be applied to costs, fees, assessments and surcharges owing as to this case.  Any remaining bail to be returned to the remittur.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

COURT ORDERS:
-  DOC to collect monetary sums/amounts (at a rate to be determined by DOC) of prison funds.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in custody. 
Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: DDS.

Matter before the court for Sentencing.  Hearing proceeds.  PSI report has been reviewed by the parties.  The state is in compliance with victim rights legislation.  The state requests restitution hearing.
  
Statements made by the state, defense, and defendant.  Additional statements made by Candance B. and Tiffany M.-G.
 
COUNT 1: The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 19 YEARS, CONSECUTIVE to COUNT 3, CONCURRENT with Washington County case 17CF023 with credit for 250 days. 
The INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 12 YEARS.  The MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION IS 7 YEARS.

COUNT 3: The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 19 YEARS, CONSECUTIVE to COUNT 1, CONCURRENT with Washington County case 17CF023. 
The INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 12 YEARS.  The MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION IS 7 YEARS.

The defendant IS NOT eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program or the Substance Abuse Program.  

CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:
*No contact with the victims (OSB and CB)
*Obtain Sex Offender evaluation and comply with any recommended treatment
*Obtain AODA assessment and comply with any recommended follow-up care/treatment
*Provide DNA sample- pay surcharge
*Pay all applicable mandatory surcharges, fees, assessments, and costs

The defendant shall pay restitution FIRST; amount to be determined.  The Court orders all court ordered financial obligation be paid from prison funds in an amount or percentage the Department (DOC) determines to be reasonable and as a condition of extended supervision.  DOC shall collect those sums.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment.

Defendant is informed that he may not possess any firearms.
Defendant is informed that he may not vote in any election until his civil rights have been reinstated.  Defendant advised of his right to appeal this sentence.  
Restitution Hearing date selected with counsel.
Filed;
-Letter from the defendant
-Ineligible Voting Notice
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Pretrial Incarceration Credit;
-Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence (copy to defendant)

  Restitution hearing scheduled for June 22, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in court with Attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Alonzo Antonio Funches in custody.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
At the hour of 4:50 p.m. the jury returned and by their foreperson submitted the following verdicts to the court:

"We, the jury, find the defendant, Alonzo Funches, GUILTY of First Degree Sexual Assault of O.B. on May 21, 2014 at 7284 West Appleton Avenue in the manner and form as charged in count one of the information."

"We, the jury, find the defendant, Alonzo Funches, NOT GUILTY of count two in the information as to M.M. on May 21, 2014 at 7284 West Appleton Avenue."

"We the jury, find the defendant, Alonzo Funches, GUILTY of First Degree Sexual Assault of C.B. on January 20, 2015 at 7730 West Appleton Avenue #2 in the manner and form as charged in count three of the information."

All verdicts:
"Dated at Milwaukee, Wisconsin, this 10 day of March, 2017." - signed by the foreperson

Court polls the jury.
Jury released and out of the box at 4:53 p.m.
State's motion for judgment of conviction as to Counts 1 and 3.
Defense motion for judgment of acquittal as to Count 2 and judgment notwithstanding the verdicts as to Counts 1 and 3.
Court grants State's motion and orders judgment of conviction as to Counts 1 and 3
Court grants defense motion as to Count 2 and orders judgment of acquittal be entered into the record.

State requests PSI.  PSI ordered.  Court orders case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 28.  Defendant remanded pending sentencing.
